body_html: @lauphedo so what you mean is cudnn_status_mapping_error is related to memory too? I have been having this error for a couple of days even when I followed instructions from different webpages and still get the error. I am using a Nvidia Quadro K2000 2GB of memory.

body: @lauphedo  so what you mean is cudnn_status_mapping_error is related to memory too? I have been having this error for a couple of days even when I followed instructions from different webpages and still get the error. I am using a Nvidia Quadro K2000 2GB of memory.
